sys_properties.name: sn_ciodashboard.CIODashboardTab3Details
sys_properties.value: { "verticalAName": "Reliability Metrics", "verticalAQuestion":"TBD" , "verticalAMetrics": [ {"metricLabel1":"MTTR", "metricLabel2": "Change Failure Rate" } ] , "verticalAMetricsdefinition": [ {"metric1": "Mean Time to Repair: How long it takes an organization to recover from a failure in production " , "metric2": "Change Failure rate: The percentage of deployments causing a failure in production" } ], "verticalBName": "Stability Metrics", "verticalBQuestion":"TBD" , "verticalBMetrics": [ {"metricLabel1":"Response Time of Service", "metricLabel2": "Availability" } ] , "verticalBMetricsdefinition": [ {"metric1": "Response time of Service: This is a measure of how quickly a control system responds to changes in input signals" , "metric2": "Availability: The uptime of service taking into consideration scheduled downtime from changes and also Major Incidents" } ], "verticalCName": "Speed Metrics", "verticalCQuestion":"TBD" , "verticalCMetrics": [ {"metricLabel1":"Lead Time for Changes", "metricLabel2": "Deployment Frequency" } ] , "verticalCMetricsdefinition": [ {"metric1": "Lead Time for Changes: The amount of time it takes a commit to get into production" , "metric2": "Deployment frequency: How often feature changes are made on the specific product (view of the backlog and associated categories)" } ], "verticalDName": "Product Delivery Performance", "verticalDQuestion":"How is the health of cloud infrastructure?" , "verticalDMetrics": [ {"metricLabel1":"Customer Experience", "metricLabel2": "Burndown Rate" } ] , "verticalDMetricsdefinition": [ {"metric1": "Customer Experience: A measure which highlights the performance of a product from the customer perspective â€“ we may need a tool like Nexthink that can auto measure this metric" , "metric2": "Burndown Rate: Shows the trend of completed and remaining work over a specified time period. Burn rate provides calculations of the completed and required rate of work based on the specified time period" } ], "verticalEName": "Hardware & Software Asset Management", "verticalEQuestion":"Status of Hardware and Software Assets" }
